channel.title: -=> BurzoPkz/317/pking/bosses/new/summoning <=-
channel.description:
[size=12pt][/size][center]Looking for the next generation of rsps? Been looking for a server since near reality closed? Want to show the world your the best pker alive?[/center]
Fancy joining a friendly and rapidly growing community? Want to go back to the old days of runescape before the eoc ruined it? How about playing a server with a stable economy? Need staff that will always help? and listen to suggestions
What we have to offer: 1) Classic 317 graphics 2) A friendly and rapid growing community 3) Various exp rates and areas to skill depending on your type of gameplay 4) Stable economy with ags/claws and other famous spec weps, with newer primary weapons such as chaotics... Also primal as a reward from dung and other "unobtainable items" 5) A new server with a clean economy and fresh players waiting to pk 6) Various shops at ::home for you to get started quickly 7) Summoning and custom skill "pking" 8) Pk point system and dung system and lots lots more.
Come and join us at http://www.rswebclients.com/play/BurzoPkz Home of the new generation pking

item.description:
@archiebaker wrote:

[size=12pt][/size][center]Looking for the next generation of rsps? Been looking for a server since near reality closed? Want to show the world your the best pker alive?[/center]

Fancy joining a friendly and rapidly growing community?
Want to go back to the old days of runescape before the eoc ruined it?
How about playing a server with a stable economy?
Need staff that will always help? and listen to suggestions

What we have to offer:

  1. Classic 317 graphics
  2. A friendly and rapid growing community
  3. Various exp rates and areas to skill depending on your type of gameplay
  4. Stable economy with ags/claws and other famous spec weps, with newer primary weapons such as chaotics… Also primal as a reward from dung and other “unobtainable items”
  5. A new server with a clean economy and fresh players waiting to pk
  6. Various shops at ::home for you to get started quickly
  7. Summoning and custom skill “pking”
  8. Pk point system and dung system
    and lots lots more.

Come and join us at
http://www.rswebclients.com/play/BurzoPkz
